content.p: The Centre for Research in Applied Linguistics (CRAL) boasts a long tradition of researching language use in a wide range of authentic contexts, contributing to the better understanding of and informing how language is used in the real world. Read about the Centre for Research in Applied Linguistics. See the list of our current and past projects. Learn more about our research groups. Find out more about our staff and students. The University of Nottingham Nottingham NG7 2RD telephone: +44 (0) 115 951 5900 fax: +44 (0) 115 951 5924 email: cral@nottingham.ac.uk
